meta.name: Decentralized Lasso Regression Demo
meta.description: A test from multi-shot Lasso regresssion

covariates.label: Covariates
covariates.description: Demographic or medical features (e.g., isControl, sex, age)

data.label: Measurements
data.description: Files containing brain region measurements (e.g., FreeSurfer files)

label.label: Label
label.description: The continuous dependent variable y to predict

train_split_local.label: Train_split_local
train_split_local.description: Proportion of data used for training at all local sites but the owner site. If <= 0, all used for testing. If a float within (0, 1), proportion of data used for training. If >= 1, all used for training.

train_split_owner.label: Train_split_owner
train_split_owner.description: Proportion of data used for training at the owner site. Same as train_split_local.

shuffle.label: Shuffle
shuffle.description: Whether or not to shuffle the data before train/test splitting.

random_state.label: Random_state
random_state.description: Controls the shuffling before train/test split. Int: a new random number generator seeded by the given int. null: use the global random state instance from numpy.random.

preprocess_method.label: Preprocess_method
preprocess_method.description: Method to transform the training data, choose from 'normalize', 'standardize', 'center' and 'none'.

max_iter.label: Max_Iter
max_iter.description: Maximum number of iteration for Lasso.

tol.label: Tol
tol.description: Tolerance for the optimization: if the total absolute change of coefficents in one iteration is smaller than it, stop training.

positive.label: Is_Coef_Positive
positive.description: Only retain positive coefficients, shrink all negative coefficients to 0.

selection.label: Selection
selection.description: Choose from 'cyclic' and 'random': if 'random', coefficients are updated randomly rather than sequentially.

lambdas.label: Lambdas
lambdas.description: If use_CV = false, list of L1 regularization parameters where to compute the models, else used in CV to pick the best lambda. If [], set by 'eps' and 'n_lambdas'.

eps.label: Eps
eps.description: Length of the regularization path, lambda_min  = eps * lambda_max.

n_lambdas.label: N_lambdas
n_lambdas.description: Number of lambda where to compute the models.

use_CV.label: Use_CV
use_CV.description: If true, compute a model at the lambda picked by CV. If false, compute models at 'lambdas'.

n_folds.label: N_folds
n_folds.description: Number of folds in CV. Should be <= n_samples in the training dataset at each local site. Otherwise will raise a ValueError.

shuffle_CV.label: Shuffle_CV
shuffle_CV.description: Whether or not shuffle the data before splitting training data into folds. The samples within each fold will not be shuffled.

random_state_CV.label: Random_state
random_state_CV.description: Controls the shuffling before splitting training data into folds. Int: a new random number generator seeded by the given int. None: use the global random state instance from numpy.random.
